description: Let Oc(n) = A005900(n) = n-th octahedral number. Consider all integer triples (i,j,k), j >= k > 0, with Oc(i) = Oc(j)+Oc(k), ordered by increasing i; sequence gives k values.
crossrefs: i values are A053676 and j values are A053677.
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Feb 16 2000
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
